languages.text: Для достижения полного взаимопонимания между Номос и Лорд-капитаном, рекомендовано провести детальную беседу без свидетелей и определить границы сосуществования.

traits.locale_text: Для достижения полного взаимопонимания между Номосом и Лордом-капитаном, рекомендовано провести детальную беседу без свидетелей и определить границы сосуществования.

languages.text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.
languages.original_text: Для достижения полного взаимопонимания между Номос и Лорд-капитаном, рекомендовано провести детальную беседу без свидетелей и определить границы сосуществования.

traits.locale_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.
An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.
An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.
An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

languages.text: 领主舰长可以与诺莫斯进行一场关于生存的深入对话，这有助于充分建立相互理解。不过，像这样的交流，最好在没有其他人在场的情况下进行。
languages.original_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长可以与诺莫斯进行一场关于生存的深入对话，这有助于充分建立相互理解。不过，像这样的交流，最好在没有其他人在场的情况下进行。

languages.text: 存在の限界についての深遠な会話は、ノモスとロード・キャプテンに完全な相互理解をもたらすのに役立つ。他に誰もいない状態でこの対話を行うのが良いだろう。
languages.original_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

traits.locale_text: 存在の限界についての深遠な会話は、ノモスとロード・キャプテンに完全な相互理解をもたらすのに役立つ。他に誰もいない状態でこの対話を行うのが良いだろう。

languages.text: Una conversación en profundidad sobre los límites de la existencia ayudará a establecer el entendimiento mutuo entre Nomos y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Es recomendable llevar este proceso a cabo sin testigos.
languages.original_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

traits.locale_text: Una conversación en profundidad sobre los límites de la existencia ayudará a establecer el entendimiento mutuo entre Nomos y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Es recomendable llevar este proceso a cabo sin testigos.

languages.text: Ein tiefgreifendes Gespräch über die Grenzen der Existenz wird helfen, für ein gegenseitiges Verständnis zischen Nomos und dem Lord Captain zu sorgen. Es wäre ratsam, besagte Unterhaltung ohne Zeugen zu führen.
languages.original_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

traits.locale_text: Ein tiefgreifendes Gespräch über die Grenzen der Existenz wird helfen, für ein gegenseitiges Verständnis zischen Nomos und dem Lord Captain zu sorgen. Es wäre ratsam, besagte Unterhaltung ohne Zeugen zu führen.

languages.text: Une profonde discussion sur les limites de l'existence aidera à établir une compréhension mutuelle entre Nomos et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. Il serait judicieux de faire en sorte que cet échange reste privé.
languages.original_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

traits.locale_text: Une profonde discussion sur les limites de l'existence aidera à établir une compréhension mutuelle entre Nomos et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. Il serait judicieux de faire en sorte que cet échange reste privé.

languages.text: Varoluşun sınırlarıyla ilgili derin bir sohbet, Nomos ve Lord Kaptan arasında karşılıklı bir anlayış oluşmasına yardımcı olacaktır. Bu görüşmenin baş başa gerçekleştirilmesi tavsiye edilir.
languages.original_text: An in-depth conversation about the limits of existence will help to establish full mutual understanding between Nomos and the Lord Captain. Holding this exchange without witnesses is advisable.

traits.locale_text: Varoluşun sınırlarıyla ilgili derin bir sohbet, Nomos ve Lord Kaptan arasında karşılıklı bir anlayış inşa edilmesine yardımcı olacaktır. Bu görüşmenin herhangi bir tanık olmadan yapılması tavsiye edilir.
